components.name: ButtonPrimary
components.code:
<script>export let label='Action'; export let disabled=false; const click=()=>{ if(disabled) return; dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('press')); };</script>
<button class="px-4 py-2 rounded bg-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-700 text-white text-sm disabled:opacity-50" {disabled} on:click={click}>{label}</button>
